Html:
Hello

When I try to open an excel file by phpexcel,I find that  the function "$php_reader->load($newfile);" can not open it successfully.The size of this file are more than 2M and I have already set the upload file size to 10M in php.ini

And I find the funciton "$objWriter->save($newfile);" does not work when the size of  "$newfile" are more than 500K

I want to know that is there any limitation of the file size or how to change the settings

 

thanks

Browse this forum for information on the memory limitations of PHP, and hence of PHPExcel... there's a lot been written about it.

You can increase your PHP memory limit, or use cell cacheing to reduce the memory that PHPExcel requires to hold your workbook.
